0.1.1.en: Update driver images and app description

0.1.3.en: Load and show inverter serial number

0.1.4.en: Add data center select functionality (need to re add devices)

0.1.5.en: Improved error handling, AMEA region Deye app details updated

0.1.6.en: Add set Solar Sell action card

0.1.7.en: Add set Work Mode action card

0.1.8.en: Add Battery Mode Control action cards (Grid Charge and Gen Charge)

1.0.0.en: Add Energy Pattern and Battery Parameters action flow cards

1.1.0.en: Added 4 daily energy metrics, and change data source

1.2.0.en: Grid available capability and trigger card added, and battery charging limits modified

1.2.2.en: Added the option to select the data source in the device settings panel. Replaced the deprecated "Station data updated" trigger card with new "Measured Data Updated" and "Daily Data Updated" trigger cards.

1.2.3.en: Add 'Set Grid Peak Shaving' action flow card

1.2.4.en: The maximum battery-related current limit has been increased to 240A due to the use of high-capacity inverters.
